amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by the United States Army Corps of Engineers for sediment or soil dumping into the Missouri River.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by the United States Army Corps of Engineers for sediment or soil dumping into the Missouri River.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A070) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
